document.full_text: alex burrows circled the net and scored a stunning goal 11 seconds into overtime, as the vancouver canucks took a 2-0 series lead over the boston bruins in the stanley cup finals.
document.title: canucks 3, bruins 2 (ot): burrows' goal 11 seconds into overtime shocks bruins
lines_and_colors: alex burrows circled the net and scored a stunning goal 11 seconds into overtime, as the vancouver canucks took a 2-0 series lead over the boston bruins in the stanley cup finals.
